text: Cells , transfection , treatments and <extra_id_0> luciferase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> assay

HeLa , <extra_id_0> p50 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - / - <extra_id_0> p65 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - / - mouse embryonic fibroblasts ( MEFs ) ( 52 ) and 293T cells were cultured in Dulbecco 's modified Eagle 's medium ; Jurkat , U937 cells and human peripheral blood mononuclear cells ( PBMCs ) were cultured in RPMI 1640 .
PBMCs were isolated as previously described ( 53 ) .
Media were supplemented with 10 % heat - inactivated fetal calf serum and 2 mM l-glutamine ( Lonza Cologne AG , Germany ) .

HeLa , <extra_id_0> p50 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - / - <extra_id_0> p65 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - / - MEFs and 293T were transfected with DNA by using FuGENE HD ( Roche Diagnostic GmbH , Mannheim , Germany ) , according to the manufacturer 's protocol ; total DNA amounts were equalized by transfection of pRc / CMV empty vector ( Invitrogen , Carlsbad , CA , USA ) .

For pulse - stimulation , HeLa cells were treated with phorbol 12-myristate 13-acetate ( PMA ; Sigma-Aldrich , St Louis , MO , USA ) ( 20 ng / ml ) for 5 min , or <extra_id_0> tumor necrosis factor-alpha <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( <extra_id_0> TNF-alpha <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ; Sigma-Aldrich ) ( 20 ng / ml ) for 30 min , washed twice in complete culture medium and then returned to culture .

For <extra_id_0> luciferase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> assays , pSV - <extra_id_0> beta-Gal <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> was co-transfected with pkappaBluc to monitor the transfection efficiency .

Forty-eight-hour post - transfection , cells were lysed in lysis buffer of Dual Light <extra_id_0> Luciferase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> System ( Tropix , Bedford , MA , USA ) and the <extra_id_0> luciferase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> beta-galactosidase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> activities were evaluated by using Dual Light Luciferase System ( Tropix ) in a bioluminometer ( Turner Biosystem , Sunnyvale , CA , USA ) .

The ratio of firefly <extra_id_0> luciferase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> activity to <extra_id_0> beta-galactosidase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> activity was expressed as relative light units .
